channel.title: Ikon on Alex Norell
channel.description: Recent content in Ikon on Alex Norell

item.title: 2023 Ski Season
item.description: The previous year we dipped our toes into the ski bum road trip lifestyle with a month long trip. It was awesome to spend so much time on the road and really learn what we like and don’t like. I switched my pass this year to the Ikon Pass to get more days at the places I love and to expand the number of places that I am able to ski.
